record.title: EXTENDING PROVISIONS OF THOMAS EDISON COMMEMORATIVE COIN ACT

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent the Banking Committee be discharged from further consideration of H.R. 188, and that the Senate then proceed to its consideration.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
record.narrative: The clerk will report the bill by title.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent the bill be read the third time, passed, and the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, without intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
